resources.string:
This application is used to view the history of earthquakes that occur in Indonesia. In this application there are four main features, such as The Lastest Earthquakes, Magnitude Map, Cluster Map, and Cluster Chart. The Lastest Earthquakes is used to view the last 3 months of earthquakes occurrence in Indonesia. Magnitude Map is used to view earthquakes occurrence from the dataset to the map with different size of point based on the magnitude of the earthquake. Cluster Map is used to view the cluster of earthquakes occurrence from the dataset to the map. Cluster Chart is used to view the cluster of earthquakes occurrence from the dataset to the chart.

Developer
Muhammad Askari

Advisor
Ali Ridho Barakbah, S.Kom., Ph.D
Isbat Uzzin Nadhori, S.Kom., M.T.

Study Program of Bachelor of Information Engineering
Departement of Information and Computer Engineering
Electronic Engineering Polytechnic Institute of Surabaya
Politeknik Elektronika Negeri Surabaya
2016
Magnitude map is a map that shows points of earthquake. The size of points is different from each other. It depends on the magnitude of the earthquake.
Cluster map is a map that shows points of earthquake. The color of points is different from each other. It depends on the cluster of the earthquake.
Cluster chart is a map that shows points of earthquake. The color of points is different from each other. It depends on the cluster of the earthquake.
